channel.title: Collaboration on Fernando's Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Collaboration on Fernando's Hub

item.title: How Businesses Use GenAI: Marketing, Support, and Innovation
item.description: Learn how small businesses use GenAI for marketing, customer support, and product development. Explore practical applications and pitfalls, emphasizing the importance of iteration to achieve high-quality results.

item.title: Hands-On: Collaborating with GenAI to Draft Creative Presentations
item.description: Discover how GenAI can support your creativity by helping you brainstorm, structure, and refine presentations. This hands-on guide highlights GenAI’s role as your collaborative partner.

item.title: How to Collaborate with AI: Creativity Meets Technology
item.description: Explore how AI can act as a partner in your creative projects, enhancing writing, brainstorming, and editing. Learn how to harness AI’s strengths while preserving your unique voice.
